alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 10:24AM CDT until March 22 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHICOT COUNTY...CENTRAL EAST CARROLL PARISH... WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA AND SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 1024 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eudora to near Shelburn to Sondheimer, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Eudora around 1030 AM CDT. Avon, Wayside, Glen Allan and Fitler around 1045 AM CDT. Rolling Fork and Grace around 1050 AM CDT. Anguilla, Nitta Yuma and Estill around 1055 AM CDT. Panther Burn around 1100 AM CDT. Leland, Delta City and Darlove around 1105 AM CDT. Tribbett around 1110 AM CDT. Murphy around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mayersville, Arcola and Cary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
